thread.title: Lamar Odom taken to hospital after being found in brothel
thread.title_full: Lamar Odom taken to hospital after being found in brothel

author: Rodney Harris
title: Lamar Odom taken to hospital after being found in brothel
text:
Lamar Odom taken to hospital after being found in brothel Posted: Follow @cbs46 LAS VEGAS (CBS46) - 
Former NBA champion Lamar Odom has been taken to a Las Vegas hospital after being found in a brothel, according to CBS46 affiliate KVVU-TV. 
Odom was taken to the UMC Trauma Center in Las Vegas after being found at the brothel in Pahrump, Nevada. 
Odom won two NBA championships with the Los Angeles Lakers. He also played for Miami, Dallas and the L.A. Clippers in the NBA. 
Copyright 2015 WGCL-TV (Meredith Corporation).
